entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 11:51 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near noon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
